question: Two organisms mate and produce offspring. Which of the following statements best explains why the offspring are unable to reproduce?
candidate_answers: (A) The parents are of a different genus and a different species. (B) The parents are of a different species, but of the same genus. (C) The parents are of the same genus and of the same species. (D) The parents are of the same species, but of a different genus.
answer: The parents are of the same species, but of a different genus.
label: D
